name: Ranatan
description:
"Demetan is a young frog from a poor family (he lives with his parents, his father is a toymaker), to the point that he cannot even afford to go to school, and for this reason he is automatically an outcast within the community . However, he makes friends with a lovely little frog, popular and very sweet, from a rich family named Ranatan; this despite the difference in their social status. " (from Wikipedia)

 In the game you play as the frog Demetan while he is intent on saving Ranatan, who finds himself mired on the other side of the screen, with many dangers in the middle of the road. 

After taking her on your shoulders, you have to bring her back to the house three times before leveling up. 

In the video I show an entire game played in "God mode", that is with the invulnerable frog, in order to show the whole game. 

Game Features: 

- "God mode": invulnerability activable in title screen. 

- 4 levels of increasing difficulty. 

- Energy bar that decreases with each contact with a hazard. It is slightly increased as you level up. 

- Double jump: essential to go from one log to another without falling into the water.
